email_prefix.comment: Prefix to be used in email subject

cron_last_run_timestamp.comment: IMPORTANT! If 'UNKNOWN' your Magento CRON is either not running OR is misconfigured. cron.sh must be executed by Apache user (eg. www-data or similar) and not as root

log_enable.label: Enable Log
log_enable.comment: Magento Log has to be enabled for this to work. Default location is {{base_dir}}/var/log/salesforce.log

log_file_read_limit.label: Log File Size limit
log_file_read_limit.comment: Kilobytes to read from the log file when viewing logs in the admin panel

new_customer.label: Create New Customers
new_customer.comment: Allow Salesforce to create new customers, if those do not exist in Magento

email_new_customer.label: Email New Customers
email_new_customer.comment: Specify whether Magento should notify new customers created from Salesforce

customer_groups_all.label: Sync all groups
customer_groups_all.comment: Synchronizes all customer groups by default, if set to NO you can choose the groups you wish to synchronize.

customer_groups.label: Customer Groups
customer_groups.comment: Only synchronize customers and orders placed by customers from these groups

default_owner.label: Default Owner
default_owner.comment: This default owner will be assigned to synchronized entity

use_address_picklist.label: Use Country/State picklist data
use_address_picklist.comment: IMPORTANT! Only enabled if you enable Country/State picklist in Salesforce. Make sure that county/state codes in Salesforce and Magento are the same.

single_account_sync_customer.label: Force into a single Account
single_account_sync_customer.comment: Force Magento to assign all Contacts to a single Account in Salesforce

merge_duplicates.label: Automated merge (BETA)
merge_duplicates.comment:
PowerSync will attempt to merge duplicate account records automatically
IMPORTANT! Don't enable this feature if you plan use a lot of Salesforce leads or contacts non-related to the Magento customers. In this case synchronization productivity can be too low!
merge_duplicates.tooltip: Limitation described for this field related to the restrictions of Salesforce API query

customer_single_record_type.label: Record Types
customer_single_record_type.comment: If you wish to force all your customers from your store to a single record type, pick the default one to use. By default PowerSync will try to establish customer type automatically and will use both record types.

customer_account.label: Default B2B Account Type
customer_account.comment: Please select appropriate business account record type, contact your Salesforce rep if you don't know!

customer_person.label: Use Person Accounts
customer_person.comment: Does your Salesforce allow you to create Person Accounts [?]

customer_person_account.label: Default B2C Account Type
customer_person_account.comment: IMPORTANT! Only enabled if your Salesforce supports Person Accounts, contact your Salesforce representative for more information

contact_asignee.label: Contact Asignee
contact_asignee.comment: How Magento should handle ownership of a Contact, if a new Contact is created in Salesforce for an existing Account

merge_duplicates.label: Automated merge (BETA)
merge_duplicates.comment:
PowerSync will attempt to merge duplicate contact records automatically
IMPORTANT! Don't enable this feature if you plan use a lot of Salesforce leads or contacts non-related to the Magento customers. In this case synchronization productivity can be too low!
merge_duplicates.tooltip: Limitation described for this field related to the restrictions of Salesforce API query

customer_integration.label: Leverage Salesforce Leads
customer_integration.comment: Create a Lead first. When customer converts by placing an order, Lead is convert to Contact an Account

customer_lead_status.label: Converted Lead Status
customer_lead_status.comment: Lead Status to be set in Salesforce when Lead to Contact/Account conversion takes place

lead_rule.label: Lead Assignment Rule
lead_rule.comment: Apply this assignment rule to a created Lead. This value will be skipped when synchronizing an Order.

customer_lead_owner.label: Default Owner
customer_lead_owner.comment: This owner will be assigned to a Contact and Account when Lead is converted

lead_source.label: Magento LeadSource
lead_source.comment: LeadSource to be used for all Leads coming from Magento

use_lead_source_filter.label: Include into lookup
use_lead_source_filter.comment: Match LeadSource when matching Leads in Salesforce

email_notification.label: Email Notification
email_notification.comment: Have Salesforce send an email notification when Lead is converted

merge_duplicates.comment:
PowerSync will attempt to merge duplicate lead records automatically
IMPORTANT! Don't enable this feature if you plan use a lot of Salesforce leads or contacts non-related to the Magento customers. In this case synchronization productivity can be too low!
merge_duplicates.tooltip: Limitation described for this field related to the restrictions of Salesforce API query

customer_newsletter_enable_sync.label: Enable Integration
customer_newsletter_enable_sync.comment:
Enable / Disable automated newsletter synchronization
IMPORTANT: For registered customers only

customer_newletter_campaign_id.label: Campaign
customer_newletter_campaign_id.comment: Text field to capture campaign ID to Newsletter config section

opportunity_display.label: Opportunity Display
opportunity_display.comment: Show / Hide Opportunities linked to a customer on the Magento Admin > Customer Detail page

opportunity_filter.label: Opportunity Filter
opportunity_filter.comment:
a Customer - only Opportunities linked to this customer will be displayed
an Account - all Opportunities from an Account will be displayed

fields.default_pricebook:
Default Pricebook select tnw_salesforce/config_pricebooks 55 1 1 0 chosen-select Salesforce Pricebook used for this store.
IMPORTANT! DO NOT use 'Standard' Pricebook and make sure each store has it's own pricebook assigned.

price_accuracy.label: Price accuracy
price_accuracy.comment: A number of decimal points for prices to be sent into Salesforce

zero_order_sync_enable.label: Zero Total
zero_order_sync_enable.comment: Synchronize orders where grand total is zero

order_product_enable.label: Synchronize Shopping Cart
order_product_enable.comment: Attach Salesforce products to the Order in Salesforce

notes_synchronize.label: Synchronize Notes
notes_synchronize.comment: Enable / Disable the ability to synchronize order notes with Salesforce

order_status_all.label: Sync all orders
order_status_all.comment: Synchronize all orders regardless of Magento status

order_status_update_customer.label: Update Customer Info
order_status_update_customer.comment: Update customer information in Salesforce each time order status in Magneto changes

order_status_allow.label: Order Statuses
order_status_allow.comment: Only synchronize orders with statuses selected above

customer_address.label: Customer Address
customer_address.comment: If customer chooses not to save billing and/or shipping address in Magento, should PowerSync use the address from the order when synchronizing records

multi_currency.label: Multi-Currency
multi_currency.comment: Enable if your Magento has multiple stores with different currencies. NOTE: Salesforce multi-currency support must be enabled as well. Salesforce Topic

currency_sync.label: Which currency should be used
currency_sync.comment: This option doesn't take affect for the "Order" and "OrderItem" mappings

customer_opportunity.label: Order Integration
customer_opportunity.comment: IMPORTANT: Integration with the Opportunity object will be decommissioned in the near future. We strongly recommend integrating with the new Salesforce Order object instead.

order_or_opportunity.label: Integration Type
order_or_opportunity.comment: Magento orders are integrated with the following Salesforce object

order_create_reverse_sync.label: Create order when the reverse synchronization
order_create_reverse_sync.comment: Enable / Disable create order when the reverse synchronization

draft_order_status.label: Draft Order Status
draft_order_status.comment:
Connector will place order in this status to make updates.
IMPORTANT: Status must be for "Draft" category and NOT in "Activated" status category.

opportunity_to_order_status.label: Converted opportunity status
opportunity_to_order_status.comment: When order is placed for an existing Opportunity, change opportunity Stage Name to the one selected

abandoned_carts.label: Abandoned Carts
abandoned_carts.comment: IMPORTANT: Abandoned cart sync feature is available for Order-to-Order sync types.

abandoned_cart_enabled.label: Capture Abandoned Carts
abandoned_cart_enabled.comment: Capture Abandoned Carts in Magento for registered customers

abandoned_cart_limit.label: When abandoned?
abandoned_cart_limit.comment: When to consider a shopping cart abandoned

abandoned_close_time_after.label: Expected Close Date
abandoned_close_time_after.comment: Days needed to close the Opportunity

abandoned_cart_state.label: Stage Name
abandoned_cart_state.comment: Default Opportunity Stage Name to be used for an Abandoned Cart

use_tax_product.label: Enable Tax Fee Product
use_tax_product.comment: Use Salesforce Product for a Tax Fee

tax_product_pricebook.label: Tax Product
tax_product_pricebook.comment: Product name must contain the word 'Tax' and must be added to the Default Pricebook you set under System : Salesforce API : Integration Setup : Product Configuration.

use_shipping_product.label: Enable Shipping Fee Product
use_shipping_product.comment: Use Salesforce Product for a Shipping Fee

shipping_product_pricebook.label: Shipping Product
shipping_product_pricebook.comment: Product name must contain the word 'Shipping' and must be added to the Default Pricebook you set under System : Salesforce API : Integration Setup : Product Configuration.

use_discount_product.label: Enable Discount Fee Product
use_discount_product.comment: Use Salesforce Product for a Discount Fee

discount_product_pricebook.label: Discount Product
discount_product_pricebook.comment: Product name must contain the word 'Discount' and must be added to the Default Pricebook you set under System : Salesforce API : Integration Setup : Product Configuration.

orders_bundle_item_sync.label: Sync Products
orders_bundle_item_sync.comment: Should PowerSync break bundle products into leaf level products to enable better inventory managements of products within Salesforce

use_product_campaign_assignment.label: Use product campaign assignments
use_product_campaign_assignment.comment: When order is placed and if any purchased products in the cart are associated to a Salesforce Campaign - PowerSync will automatically associate a Contact to all campaigns associated with purchased products

customer_form_enable.label: Enable contact form integration
customer_form_enable.comment: Create a Salesforce task when contacts form is submitted

sync_enabled.label: Enable Integration
sync_enabled.comment: Integrate Shopping Cart Price Rules with Salesforce Campaigns
